Methods

DerivePathAndFileNames(string, out string, out string, string)

Separates the given source data URI into its path and file components.

public void DerivePathAndFileNames(string sourceDataUri, out string path, out string file, string filenameOverride)

Parameters

sourceDataUri string

The source data URI to separate.

path string

The path component of the URI.

file string

The file component of the URI.

filenameOverride string

Optional filename override for URIs that are difficult to derive a filename from.

DownloadFile(string, string, bool, string)

Download the source data and source license.

public virtual Task<string> DownloadFile(string sourceDataUri, string rootDataDirectory, bool overwrite = false, string filenameOverride = "")

Parameters

sourceDataUri string

The URI of the source data to download.

rootDataDirectory string

Directory where files will be read and written from.

overwrite bool

Set to true to overwrite previously downloaded files. Default: false.

filenameOverride string

Optional filename override for URIs that are difficult to derive a filename from.

Returns

Task<string>

Local path where the file is stored.
